title: How to adjust client settings to fit Surface Pro 4
body:
The new client looks great but I'm not able to use it due to not being actually able to see the right quarter of the client even if i move the window. Cant find any of the setting to change it as they may be in the hidden part. 

Help?

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should be able to manually adjust the clients size through the config file.

* Navigate to **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**
* Open **LCULocalPreferences.yaml** in your text editor of choice.
* Set ZoomScale to **0.800000**
* Save and open your client.
